channel.title: Skillcapes and some items
channel.description:
Hey guys, I started making a RSPS and I just had a couple a of quick questions. I've made and coded servers way back in 07, and I would like to make a really cool server. I am using the 317 wilddreams source. It's basically an 06 source. Now, the skillcape shop shows team capes instead of skillcapes, and other items such as the rune defender and torso and the assault minigame are showing up as a chef's hat and something else. Would I need to replace the item id's of those for the skillcape id's?
Thanks

item.title: Skillcapes and some items
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

potted scim:

Thanks you, I’ll give it a shot, could you link me to a website with the 317 skillcape id’s?

itemdb.biz
search something like, skillcape.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes and some items
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Replace the id’s inside the shops.cfg, but yes, you change the ids.

Read full topic
